entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS, MAINLY THIS MORNING
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
PATCHY FOG AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

CLOUDY
PATCHY FOG IN THE MORNING
SHOWERS, MAINLY IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 60
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY IN THE AFTERNOON
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
